sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Update state for data management rollback operation</description>
        <name>AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState = Class.create();
AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    setRollbackState: function() {
        var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId');
        var dm_table = this.getParameter('sysparm_dm_table');

        var gr = new GlideRecord(dm_table);
        if (gr.get(sys_id)) {
            if (gr.rollback_context.state == 'rolled_back') {
                gr.state = "rolled_back";
                gr.update();
            }
        }
        return '';

    },

    type: 'AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-08-06 18:10:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0cc4469c53621010e414ddeeff7b12ce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXUpdateDMTRollbackState</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Data Management" source="com.glide.data_management">5a5355e12f221110d8a4d5f62799b631</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0cc4469c53621010e414ddeeff7b12ce</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-17 19:46:09</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>591</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
